entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:

Dear Guy,

Thanks to you & the team for this submission. It is under review by Area Directory Richard H-J, and will be reviewed by the standards council, prior to public comment.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:
Dear authors/editors: Reminder that we await your further revisions, prior to moving this document to public comment. Please coordinate with your area director if additional guidance is needed. Thanks,
    Greg

    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:
Authors, editors, wG members: Please submit comments here https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/40

    Affirmative comments from WG members and others are welcome, as are more substantive comments. Public comments are due by September 2 2017.

entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to AD review
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Richard Hughes-Jones

The 60-day public comment period is closed, and no comments were received. This is now turned back to the Area Director for decision on next steps for publication.

entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Richard Hughes-Jones to Greg Newby

Per the standards council discussion of May 11, 2018, this is now approved for publication. Whilst there were no public comments, this had undergone significant review within the WG, and by the AD.

entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:
• File GFD-R.236.docx added
  • File GFD-R.236.pdf added
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Alan Sill

I have assigned GFD #236 and created the PDF from the attached .docx.

There is a stub here: https://www.ogf.org/dokuwiki/doku.php/documents/documents

Alan needs to actually deposit the document where the Doku webserver can find it.

entry.title: Editor - document #293: draft-gwdrp-macauley-document-distribution-service-public-comment-v1
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to published
  • Assignee changed from Alan Sill to Greg Newby

Copied the document to /var/www/ogfweb/documents/ as GFD.236.pdf and made a soft link to this file from the lower-case variant gfd.236.pdf (as we have always done to avoid case sensitivity in retrieving documents). Reassigning to Greg to close if there are no remaining problems.
